alert.note: Alert for Allegany; Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Southern Erie; Wyoming (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 19 at 10:41AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Wyoming, Cattaraugus, southern Erie, eastern Chautauqua and western Allegany Counties through 1145 AM EDT... At 1041 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Derby to near Frewsburg. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rains could cause flooding. Locations impacted include... Jamestown, Olean, Hamburg, East Aurora, Salamanca, Allegany State Park, Letchworth State Park, Evans, Boston, Eden, Springville, Perry, Warsaw, Colden, Orchard Park, Gowanda, Falconer, Ashford, Angola and Arcade. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between exits 57 and 57A. Interstate 86 between exits 13 and 29. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Allegany; Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Southern Erie; Wyoming
